Articles.Content: It would be nice if the gauge at the top of the screen could be swapped from the VSI to other gauges, like the radio altimeter by clicking it, like the speed changes between surface, orbit, target.
Ooh, I would LOVE that. Sometimes I'm forced to land on land, and need to go IVA to use the radio altimeter. This is a pretty great idea!
Suggested a hundred times, probably. I have seen multiple cases, at least. Shows how much this is needed.
I've seen the on screen RA suggestion, but not one for swapping the gauge in the top of the display.
